description: This file sets up an AI agent with specific tools (DuckDuckGo and Yahoo Finance) and issues a request for a detailed report on NVDA, including financial data and news.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with AI models and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class representing an OpenAI chat model.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool class for performing searches via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A tool class for retrieving financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response based on a prompt, with streaming output.
